Sling of Accuracy

one handed weapon (lvl 0)

item id [id]: 17
weap id [weapon]: 697 (Sling of Accuracy)
damage [dmg]: 12
range [range]: 40
precision [prec]: +5
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
ammunition [ammo]: 15
 
(Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], One Third Strength added [bowstr], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 5A to forge (A1)

Most slings are difficult to aim, but this one has been enchanted with Air magic to make it shoot further and much more accurately.
